org.vast.ows

Interface OWSResponseWriter<ResponseType extends OWSResponse>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResponseWriter, CoverageDescriptionsWriterV11, CoverageManifestWriterV11, DescribeResultAccessResponseWriterV20, DescribeTaskingResponseWriterV20, GetFeasibilityResponseWriterV20, GetResultTemplateResponseWriterV20, GetStatusResponseWriterV20, InsertObservationResponseWriterV20, InsertResultResponseWriterV20, InsertResultTemplateResponseWriterV20, InsertSensorResponseWriterV20, OWSCapabilitiesWriterV0, OWSCapabilitiesWriterV11, RegisterResponseWriterV10, SOSCapabilitiesWriterV20, SPSCapabilitiesWriterV20, SWEResponseWriter, SWESCapabilitiesWriterV20, TaskingResponseWriterV20, UnregisterResponseWriterV10, WCSCapabilitiesWriterV11, WCSTransactionAckWriterV11, WNSCapabilitiesWriterV10

    public interface OWSResponseWriter<ResponseType extends OWSResponse>

    Base interface for all OWS response writers

    Since:
    21 nov. 07 * @param Type of response object supported by this writer
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Element buildXMLResponse(DOMHelper dom, ResponseType response)
      Builds a DOM element containing the response XML.
      Note that the element is not yet appended to any parent.
      Element buildXMLResponse(DOMHelper dom, ResponseType response, String version)
      Builds a DOM element containing the response XML for the given version.
      Note that the element is not yet appended to any parent.
      void writeXMLResponse(OutputStream os, ResponseType response)
      Writes the XML response directly to the output stream
      void writeXMLResponse(OutputStream os, ResponseType response, String version)
      Writes the XML response for the desired version directly to the output stream

    • Method Detail

      • buildXMLResponse

        Element buildXMLResponse(DOMHelper dom,
                       ResponseType response)
                         throws OWSException
        Builds a DOM element containing the response XML.
        Note that the element is not yet appended to any parent.
        Parameters:
        dom - DOMHelper instance that will own the generated element
        response - response object to serialize as XML
        Returns:
        DOM element containing the XML representation of the response
        Throws:
        OWSException

      • buildXMLResponse

        Element buildXMLResponse(DOMHelper dom,
                       ResponseType response,
                       String version)
                         throws OWSException
        Builds a DOM element containing the response XML for the given version.
        Note that the element is not yet appended to any parent.
        Parameters:
        dom - DOMHelper instance that will own the generated element
        response - response object to serialize as XML
        version - version of writer to use
        Returns:
        DOM element containing the XML representation of the response
        Throws:
        OWSException

      • writeXMLResponse

        void writeXMLResponse(OutputStream os,
                    ResponseType response)
                      throws OWSException
        Writes the XML response directly to the output stream
        Parameters:
        os - output stream where the XML data will be written
        response - response object to serialize as XML
        Throws:
        OWSException

      • writeXMLResponse

        void writeXMLResponse(OutputStream os,
                    ResponseType response,
                    String version)
                      throws OWSException
        Writes the XML response for the desired version directly to the output stream
        Parameters:
        os - output stream where the XML data will be written
        response - response object to serialize as XML
        version - version of writer to use
        Throws:
        OWSException
